title: Riot I CAN'T LOGIN TO SUPPORT
body: Riot I CAN'T LOGIN TO SUPPORT. I WANNA REMOVE CHAMPIONS IN MY ACCOUNT, COZ I PLAY SUP AND ADC ONLY. I CAN'T SEE ANYTHING ELSE IN MY CHAMPION POOL, PLZ REMOVE AKALI AMUMU ANIVIA BRAND CHO'GATH MUNDO EKKO EVELYNN FIDDLESTICKS GANGPLANK GAREN HECARIM HEIMERDINGER IRELIA JAX KARTHUS KASSADIN KATARINA KAYLE MALPHITE MASTER YI MORDEKAISER NASUS  RAMMUS RYZE SHACO SHEN SINGED SION TRYNDAMERE VEIGAR WARWICK . I DON'T NEED THEM ANYMORE AND I DON'T NEED ANY REFUNDS. PLZ JUST REMOVE THEM.{{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:4}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm currently able to log into support without any issues.

Could you try with a different browser? Or an incognito window in your current browser.
